author: smor
msg: I added an AskTag, in an InteractionTagLibrary, so that Jelly
scripts can retrieve variables from the user.
The AskTag is used as :
<ask question="Your question"
answer="interaction.ask.answer"
default="Default answer"/>
You can then <echo>${interaction.ask.answer}</echo>.
If there is no input, it will be "Default answer".
This is useful to set variables dynamically from the user.
